poetic_corpus.poem:
<tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='DT'>the</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Rock</tag>, <tag class='JJ'>presumptuous</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Sea</tag>! <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='VBN'>set</tag> <tag class='TO'>to</tag> <tag class='VB'>encounter</tag> <tag class='NNP'>thee.</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Angry</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='VBD'>loud</tag>, <tag class='CC'>or</tag> <tag class='VB'>gentle</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='RB'>still</tag>, <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='VBN'>set</tag> <tag class='RB'>here</tag> <tag class='TO'>to</tag> <tag class='VB'>limit</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>power</tag>, <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='MD'>will</tag> <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='DT'>the</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Rock</tag> !
<tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='DT'>the</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Rock.</tag> <tag class='NNP'>From</tag> <tag class='NN'>age</tag> <tag class='TO'>to</tag> <tag class='NN'>age</tag> <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>scorn</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>fury</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='NN'>dare</tag> <tag class='NN'>thy</tag> <tag class='NNP'>rage.</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Scarred</tag> <tag class='IN'>by</tag> <tag class='NN'>frost</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='NN'>worn</tag> <tag class='IN'>by</tag> <tag class='NN'>time</tag>, <tag class='NNP'>Brown</tag> <tag class='IN'>with</tag> <tag class='NN'>weed</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='JJ'>green</tag> <tag class='IN'>with</tag> <tag class='JJ'>slime</tag>, <tag class='NNP'>Thou</tag> <tag class='NNP'>may'st</tag> <tag class='NN'>drench</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='JJ'>defile</tag> <tag class='NN'>me</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='NN'>spit</tag>
<tag class='IN'>in</tag> <tag class='PRP$'>my</tag> <tag class='NN'>face</tag>,
<tag class='CC'>But</tag> <tag class='IN'>while</tag> <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='RB'>here</tag> <tag class='PRP'>thou</tag> <tag class='JJ'>keep'st</tag> <tag class='JJ'>thy</tag> <tag class='NN'>place</tag>! <tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='DT'>the</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Rock</tag>!
<tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>am</tag> <tag class='DT'>the</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Rock</tag>, <tag class='VBG'>beguiling</tag> <tag class='NNP'>Sea</tag>!
<tag class='PRP'>I</tag> <tag class='VBP'>know</tag> <tag class='PRP'>thou</tag> <tag class='NN'>art</tag> <tag class='NN'>fair</tag> <tag class='IN'>as</tag> <tag class='JJ'>fair</tag> <tag class='NN'>can</tag> <tag class='VB'>be</tag>,
<tag class='IN'>With</tag> <tag class='JJ'>golden</tag> <tag class='NN'>glitter</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='NN'>silver</tag> <tag class='IN'>sheen</tag>
<tag class='CC'>And</tag> <tag class='NN'>bosom</tag> <tag class='IN'>of</tag> <tag class='JJ'>blue</tag> <tag class='CC'>and</tag> <tag class='NNS'>garments</tag> <tag class='IN'>of</tag> <tag class='JJ'>green</tag>.
